author: Simon Difford
description: This tequila (in place of gin) based riff on a White Lady is basically a Margarita made with lemon rather than lime, softened and smoothed by egg white. This is a delightful drink. Go easy spraying the zest as this can overly dominate the drink. It also works best with a light agave syrup as the darker versions affect its virgin-like hue and can add unwanted caramel notes.
name: Dama Blanca

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker
DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass
